class.name: MetaPlatformSDK_LeaderboardUpdateStatus
class.brief_description: Represents a status update to a leaderboard.
class.description: Represents a status update to a leaderboard.

method.name: get_updated_challenge_id
method.description: If the leaderboard is updated, this represents the updated challenge IDs. The updated challenge IDs can be used by [method MetaPlatformSDK.challenges_get_entries_async], [method MetaPlatformSDK.challenges_get_entries_after_rank_async] or [method MetaPlatformSDK.challenges_get_entries_by_ids_async].

members.member: A `boolean` indicates whether the leaderboard was updated.
